title: Food
text:
Dinner Specials
TRUFFLED CACIO E PEPE 29
bucatini, black truffle butter, garlic, pecorino, course black pepper, parsley
add grilled tofu: 5 / grilled chicken: 7 / sautéed prawns: 9 / marinated steak: 12 / lobster or dungeness crab: 12
tastes even better with:
Vignobles Arbeau 'On l'Appelle Braucol, Comte Tolosan, France · 12
DUCK CASSOULET 40
duck confit, pancetta, butter beans, herb breadcrumb
tastes even better with:
2020 Château de Minière Bourgueil, France · 15
SEARED SCALLOPS 45
crispy prosciutto, charred brussels sprouts, sweet potato puree, chili-toasted pepitas, apple cider gastrique
tastes even better with:
2022 L'Ecole No 41 'Old Vines' Chennin Blanc, Yakima Valley . 16
Starters
MARINATED OLIVES 8
kalamata, cerignola, castelvetrano, herb infused olive oil, orange zest
V
tastes even better with:
Dios Baco Fino Sherry Jerez, Spain NV · 8
TOASTED DEMI BAGUETTE 8
herb butter, balsamic garlic
GORGONZOLA DATES 10
gorgonzola, prosciutto, chive, pine nut, aged balsamic
tastes even better with:
2020 Two Vintners Syrah, Columbia Valley · 16
SEASONAL BURRATA 20
mixed melon, prosciutto, frisée, pickled red onion, crispy garlic, balsamic reduction, olive oil, mint and basil, grilled sourdough
tastes even better with:
2018 Dowsett Family Gewurtztraminer, Columbia Gorge · 13
CHEESE & MEAT 32
2 imported artisan cheeses, 2 imported cured meats, house made accoutrements - chili-toasted almonds, pickled vegetables, dried cranberries, house crackers
tastes even better with:
Dios Baco Fino Sherry Jerez, Spain NV · 8
BAKED BRIE 18
apricot, caramelized onion, candied walnut, house crackers, grapes
tastes even better with:
2020 Clos de Nouys Chenin Blanc, Vouvray, France · 15
HOUSE CUT FRIES 9
chipotle aïoli, ketchup
tastes even better with:
Louis Armand Premier Cru Brut, Mareuil-sur-Aÿ, Vallée de la Marne, Champagne, France · 24
SPICY PRAWNS 22
herb-garlic butter sauce, toasted baguette
tastes even better with:
2021 Karl Josef 'Piesporter Michelsberg' Spätlese Riesling · 14
SAUTÉED CALAMARI 22
spicy tomato and white wine sauce, castelvetrano olive, garbanzo bean, capers, shallot, garlic, lemon olive oil, italian herbs, grilled garlic sourdough
tastes even better with:
2022 Côte Bonneville 'DuBrul Vineyard' Riesling, Yakima Valley · 15
DUNGENESS CRAB CAKES 32
frisée, lemon arbol aïoli
tastes even better with:
2022 Ashan 'Barrel-Fermented' Chardonnay, Columbia Valley, Washington · 15
Soups and Salads
add sautéed prawns • 9 | grilled chicken • 7 | | grilled steak • 12 | grilled tofu • 5
TOMATO SOUP 9
san marzano tomato, fresh ground pepper, olive oil drizzle
V
tastes even better with:
2018 Stag Hollow Pinot Noir, Yamhill-Carlton, Oregon · 14
MIXED GREENS 8
dried cherries, shaved parmesan, oregano vinaigrette
tastes even better with:
2020 Terres Blondes Gamay Noir, Loire Valley, France · 13
LITTLE GEM CAESAR 17
fried crouton, crispy garlic, everything bagel spice, shaved parmesan, anchovy caesar dressing, lemon wedge
tastes even better with:
2021 Nortico Alvarinho, Minho, Portugal · 12
PURPLE CHOPPED 17
romaine, radicchio, cured black olives, cherry tomato, mama lil's peppers, english cucumber, garbanzo bean, red onion, feta, oregano vinaigrette, basil and mint
2020 Domaine de la Denante Pinot Noir, Bourgogne, France · 17
tastes even better with:
2022 Côte Bonneville 'DuBrul Vineyard' Riesling, Yakima Valley · 15
CRANBERRY CHICKEN 20
pulled chicken, bacon, apple, celery, dried cranberry, almond, scallion, parmigiano-reggiano, cranberry vinaigrette
tastes even better with:
2022 Kind Stranger Rosé, Columbia Valley · 12
Sandwiches
Served with choice of mixed green salad or house cut fries.
substitute soup or sweet potato fries • 2
IMPOSSIBLE VEGAN SANDWICH 20
vegan cheddar, tomato, mixed greens, red onion jam, lemon arbol aïoli, grilled sourdough
V
tastes even better with:
Holy Mountain 'White Lodge' Belgian-Style White Ale Ballard, Washington · 8
MISO BURGER 22
miso honey bacon, smoked gouda, radicchio, roma tomato, soy-ginger aioli, toasted brioche bun
tastes even better with:
2021 Kevin White Rhone Blend, Yakima Valley · 17
SALMON BURGER 28
mixed greens, pickled red onion, cucumber, tomato, green olive aïoli, grilled brioche bun
tastes even better with:
2021 Chateau d'Aqueria Rosé, Tavel France · 17
Pastas
add sautéed prawns • 9 | grilled chicken • 7 | grilled tofu • 5
FUSILLI ALLA VODKA 27
sautéed broccolini, garlic, shallot, parmigiano-reggiano, fresh basil
tastes even better with:
2022 Côte Bonneville 'DuBrul Vineyard' Riesling, Yakima Valley · 15
SHISHITO-BASIL PESTO 28
fusilli, charred teardrop tomato and alliums, dry vermouth, crumbled feta, toasted breadcrumb, lemon zest
tastes even better with:
2015 Chateau Bois d'Arlene 'Orgine' Vacqueyras, Côtes du Rhône, France · 17
SWEET CORN & MUSHROOM RISOTTO 32
infused corn broth, pancetta, melted fennel and garlic, pecorino romano, crispy shallot, chili oil
tastes even better with:
2022 Ashan 'Barrel Fermented' Chardonnay, Columbia Valley · 15
SPICY SHRIMP ARRABIATA 32
bucatini, garlic, chili flake, fried basil, parmesan, olive oil
tastes even better with:
2022 L'Ecole No 41 'Old Vines' Chennin Blanc, Yakima Valley . 16
LOBSTER MAC AND CHEESE 41
campanelle, mornay sauce, truffle salt, toasted breadcrumb
add dungeness crab: 12
tastes even better with:
2021 Lydian 'Alto' Sauvignon Blanc/Semillon, Columbia Valley · 15
Mains
ROASTED CAULIFLOWER 28
hazelnut romesco, wild rice, caramelized summer squash, spinach, shallot, garlic, calabrian chili-infused honey, cilantro, scallion, hazelnut
V
tastes even better with:
2012 Mariell 'Grosshoflein' Grüner Veltliner, Burgenland, Austria · 15
COQ AU VIN 36
grilled airline chicken breast, pancetta, fingerling potatoes, foraged mushrooms, caramelized pearl onion, roasted garlic, fresh thyme and parsley
tastes even better with:
2022 Solena Pinot Gris, Willamette Valley · 14
SEARED DUCK 38
sautéed rapini, sauteed alliums, roasted duck fat potatoes, port blueberry reduction, parsley
tastes even better with:
2018 Domaine de Thulon ‘Vieilles Vignes’ Gamay Noir, Régnié, France · 15
WASHINGTON RUN TROLL SALMON 45
crispy salmon skin, prosciutto lardons, roasted peppers and corn, grilled zucchini, fingerling potatoes, corn soubise, mustard crema, fennel fronds
tastes even better with:
2020 Domaine Allimant-Laugner Pinot Noir, Alsace, France · 17
GRILLED BAVETTE STEAK 55
10oz painted hills natural beef, baby-red mashed potatoes, grilled broccolini, chimichurri, smoked bone marrow butter, veal demi, scallion
tastes even better with:
2015 Château Goubau 'La Source' Castillon Cotes de Bordeaux, France · 14
* According to the health department, raw or undercooked meat, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
